snippet.title: Aliens Vs Predator 2 game trailer (PC 2001)
snippet.description:
Play as Alien, Predator, or a Colonial Marine-each armed with unique new weapons and abilities 

Explore the weird and terrifying planet LV1201 

21 intense single player missions set in 3 interlocking story lines 

Play as 1 of 10 characters in 12 multiplayer levels 

Multiplayer game types include survivor, Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Hunt
